live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!
Our technicians continue the final repairs to services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.
Power has been restored, and services are back online for most customers. Technicians continue to restore services for a few remaining areas.
Small update to region impacted as Hydro crews continue their work and some of our customers come back online automatically.

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored.
